癄字的基本解释

癄
qiáo
古同“憔”。

癄
jiào
物缩小。

癄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiáo］
［《廣韻》側效切，去效，莊。］
［《集韻》慈焦切，平宵，從。］
憔悴。参见“癄瘁”。

癄字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癄； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页780第26
【集韻】慈焦切【正韻】慈消切，?音樵。與憔同。　又【集韻】【韻會】?子肖切，音醮。【集韻】病也。【博雅】癄，縮也。【釋文】子笑反。【前漢·禮樂志】是以纖微癄瘁之音作，而民思憂。【註】癄瘁，謂滅縮也。音子笑反。　又【廣韻】則教切【集韻】阻教切，?音㧓。義同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　癄; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 780 26
[Ji Yun] Ci Jiao Qi [Zheng Yun] Ci Xiao Qi,? Yin Qiao. Same as 憔.　[Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Zi Xiaoqie, the sound is 醮. [Jiyun] Illness. [Bo Ya] 癄, shrink too. [Explanation] The child laughed back. [Previous Han·Liyuezhi] It is written in the sound of faint and faint, and the people are worried. [Note] 癄癁 is also called extinction and shrinkage. Yinzi laughed.　[Guangyun] teaches cutting [Jiyun] to hinder teaching cutting,? Yin 㧓. The same meaning.
